game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is torn apart, and ancient evils have awoken. Players take on the role of a temporal guardian, tasked with exploring the remnants of civilization, uncovering the mysteries behind the cataclysmic event known as 'The Great Dissonance', and restoring balance to the timestream.
game.beginning: The game begins in the midst of a catastrophic event, where the player's character is revealed to be one of the few surviving members of an ancient order sworn to protect the integrity of time. With their powers awakened, they set out on a perilous journey across a shattered world, navigating treacherous landscapes and battling fearsome enemies.
game.ending: Ultimately, the player must face the mastermind behind The Great Dissonance: an otherworldly being known as 'The Time Reaver'. In a climactic showdown, the player's character will either succeed in restoring balance to the timestream or succumb to the void, forever altering the course of history. The fate of eternity hangs in the balance.
